QuestData.Title: WANTED: Onslaught Commander Iustus
QuestData.Description: Posted by: Highlord Leoric Von Zeldig$B$BUpon the northeastern path from Wintergarde a battalion of 7th Legion were ambushed and slain by Onslaught Commander Iustus and an army of mindless Scarlet Onslaught zealots. Such cold and calculated actions must be met with force!$B$BWintergarde demands justice! Seek out Onslaught Commander Iustus at Onslaught Base Camp to the northeast and end his miserable existence.$B$BI will hand out the reward for this bounty to any who would dare take up the task!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Onslaught Commander Iustus and return to Highlord Leoric Von Zeldig at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight to collect your reward.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Leoric grits his teeth.>$B$BIs that pompous fool dead?
QuestData.RewardText: At least for now the Scarlet Onslaught suffers a setback in their nefarious plans. You have done Wintergarde a great service, $n.
